mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_commission_order_comment ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, admin_user_id, commission_order_id, content) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{adminUserId}, #{commissionOrderId}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, admin_user_id AS adminUserId, commission_order_id AS commissionOrderId, content FROM b_commission_order_comment WHERE commission_order_id = #{commissionOrderId} ORDER BY gmt_create ASC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_commission_order_comment WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
